workshop.title: Oracle ClassOf SE 2019
workshop.description: Welcome to the **Oracle Cloud Security** Hand-on Labs. We will walk you through the process of managing user ids, on-boarding and monitoring third party applications, create policies, run reports and monitor OCI.

labs.title: Lab 1: Oracle CASB Cloud Service
labs.description: Learn how to secure your apps and infrastructure with Oracle CASB Cloud Service

labs.title: Lab 100: Oracle Identity Cloud Service
labs.description: Learn how to manage your enterprise user id life cycle
